All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    Constants
    Constants class to store all the constants used in the app.
    CultureFragment
    CultureFragment class is a subclass of Fragment class that displays a list of culture related news A simple Fragment subclass.
    EducationFragment
    EducationFragment is a subclass of Fragment that displays a list of news.
    FashionFragment
    FashionFragment is a subclass of Fragment that displays a list of fashion news.
    FragmentHelper
    FragmentHelper class is a helper class that contains methods that are used in the fragments
    HomeFragment
    HomeFragment is the main fragment of the app.
    Keys
    Keys class to store the API keys for the app.
    LifeStyleFragment
    LifeStyleFragment is a Fragment subclass that displays a list of lifestyle related news articles A simple Fragment subclass.
    News
    News object that contains the title, section, date, and url of the news article from the Guardian API.
    NewsActivity
    NewsActivity is the main activity of the app.
    NewsAdapter
    Adapter for the list of news items.
    NewsLoaderFragment
    Loads a list of news by using an AsyncTask to perform the network request to the given URL.
    PoliticsFragment
    PoliticsFragment is a Fragment subclass that displays a list of politics news articles A simple Fragment subclass.
    QueryUtilities
    Helper methods related to requesting and receiving news data from the Guardian API.
    SettingsActivity
    SettingsActivity is the activity that allows the user to change the settings of the app such as the number of articles to display, the order of the articles and whether to show the news author or not.
    SettingsActivity.NewsPreferenceSettings
    This fragment shows the preferences for the first header.
    SportsFragment
    SportsFragment is a Fragment subclass that displays a list of sports news articles A simple Fragment subclass.
    TechnologyFragment
    TechnologyFragment is a Fragment subclass that displays a list of technology related news articles A simple Fragment subclass which displays a list of news related to technology.
    UserPreference
    UserPreference class to store user preferences for the app.
